hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $59+40$ then subtract $3$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{59}+\purpleC{37}=&\greenD{59}+\purpleC{40}-\purpleC{3} \\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

Add $50+30$ then add $9$ then add $7$.


>$\begin{align}\greenD{59}+\purpleC{37}&=\greenD{50}+\greenD{9}+\purpleC{30}+\purpleC7\\
&= \greenD{50}+\purpleC{30}+\greenD{9}+\purpleC{7}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $59+37$.**

- Add $59+40$ then subtract $3$.

- Add $50+30$ then add $9$ then add $7$.
